description: Defines a React functional component 'Badge' that renders a styled label with different variants such as info, warning, error, success, and neutral. It includes a helper function 'variantStyles' to determine styles based on variant type.

methods.name: variantStyles(variant)
methods.description: Determines style properties (background and foreground colors) based on the 'variant' prop.

methods.name: Badge({ variant = "neutral", size = "sm", children })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a styled span element with configurable variant and size.

ctags.name: Badge
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Badge({ variant = "neutral", size = "sm", children }) {$/
